chapters.title: The Dreamer
chapters.content:
Kaito had always been a vivid dreamer, but lately, his dreams featured the same mysterious woman with kind eyes and a gentle smile. Night after night, they would meet in a beautiful garden where they talked about everything and nothing.

"Who are you?" he finally asked in one dream.

"Someone who's been waiting for you," she replied. "In another life, perhaps."

When Kaito woke up, he felt more rested than he had in months, but also yearned for something he couldn't name.

chapters.title: Reality Meets Dream
chapters.content:
Determined to find the woman from his dreams, Kaito began sketching her face from memory. His friend suggested he show the drawing to people in the city.

Miraculously, he found her at a local caf√©. Her name was Aiko, and she had been having the same dreams about him.

"I think we've been dreaming of each other," Aiko said, tears in her eyes. "It's like we were meant to find each other in both dreams and reality."

Their love story had begun in the space between sleeping and waking, but it was very real when they were together.
